thread.title: Research and Markets: Japan Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook to 2025
thread.title_full: Research and Markets: Japan Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook to 2025

title: Research and Markets: Japan Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook to 2025
text:
DUBLIN--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/jclrjj/japan_oil_and_gas ) has announced the addition of the "Japan Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook to 2025 - Forecasts of Supply, Demand, Investment, Companies and Infrastructure (Fields, Blocks, Pipelines, LNG, Refinery, Storage Assets)" report to their offering. 
The author, one of the leading research and consulting service providers for the oil and gas industry, recently published the Japan Oil and Gas Strategic Analysis and Outlook to 2025. The premier report provides analysis of key opportunities and associated challenges facing Japan oil and gas industry. 
Amidst downfall in oil prices creating uncertainty on the future of Japan industry growth, the report details key strategies of government, oil and gas companies and investors in the country. Detailed outlook of the industry in terms of production forecasts of oil, gas, LNG, LPG, gasoline, diesel, fuel oil along with supporting parameters of primary energy demand, GDP and population are included. 
Current status of planned projects along with the possible commencement of the projects, feasibility of developing those projects in current market conditions, expected start up, impact of competing assets in other countries and overall industry developments, investments required and other related information on planned projects is provided in detail. 
The comprehensive guide provides analysis and forecasts of Japan oil and gas market for the period 2000 to 2025. Asset by asset details of all existing and planned projects across Japan oil and gas value chain are detailed in the report. 
Key Topics Covered:
